casebody.data:
No. 369,

Misc.

Deveny v. United States. Petitioner pro se. Solicitor General Rankin for thé United States: Harry P. Thomson, Jr. for the Casualty Company.

The motion to add American Casualty Company of Reading, Pennsylvania, as a party respondent is granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
